card.name: Supernova Venus la Saint Mother
card.text: ■ Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Guardians, Great Mecha Kings, and/or Arc Seraphims. ■ Meteorburn—When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard instead. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Death Monarch, Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may put all non-evolution Demon Commands from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Supernova Pluto Deathbringer
card.text: ■ Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Death Puppets, Grand Devils, and/or Tyranno Drakes. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a creature under this card into your graveyard. If you do, destroy one of your opponent's creatures. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Great Cactus
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Wild Veggies from it, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

card.name: Supernova Mars Disaster
card.text: ■ Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Tyranno Drakes, Dreammates, and/or Humans. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, destroy all creatures that have power 4000 or less. ■ Triple Breaker

card.name: Me Fusar, Guardian of Harmony
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature is destroyed, during this turn, no creatures can attack.

card.name: Balbas, Lord of Devils
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Grand Devils. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever a creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, choose a card in the battle zone that costs 3 or less and return it to its owner's hand. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Shadowwave Cyclone
card.text: ■ Cyclone ■ Choose a card in the battle zone or either player's mana zone, and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Fuuma Garmagias
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, this turn, all your other creatures can't attack. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Inferno Gate
card.text: ■ Put a non-evolution creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

card.name: Trap Commune
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a race. Destroy any number of your creatures that have that race. Then destroy a number of your opponent's creatures equal to or less than the number of your creatures destroyed this way.

card.name: Perionbris Dragoon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, all your other creatures must attack if able. ■ If this creature is tapped during your opponent's turn, each of your opponent's creatures must attacks if able.

card.name: Sandal, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ When you put a creature into the battle zone, you may return one of your Arc Seraphims or Wild Veggies from your mana zone to your hand.

card.name: Assault Champion
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each of your other Arc Seraphims and Beast Folk in the battle zone get +3000 power and "double breaker" until the End Step

card.name: Farmahat, Holy Emperor
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Arc Seraphims. ■ Meteorburn—Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. This creature untaps and gets "blocker" until the End Step ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Cyber Robo Diecrusher
card.text: ■ Dynamo ■ End Step

card.name: Reverse Cyclone
card.text: ■ Cyclone ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and tap it.

card.name: Fuuma Balzoo
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Hydro Commune
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose a race. Return any number of your creatures in the battle zone that have that race to your hand. Then return a number of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone equal to or less than the number of creatures you returned to your hand to their owner's hand.

card.name: Fuuma Raum
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, all of your creatures in the battle zone can't attack this turn. ■ Slayer

card.name: Vise Cyclone
card.text: ■ Cyclone ■ Your opponent discards a card from their hand.

card.name: Igars Dragoon
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ If this creature is tapped during your opponent's turn, each of your opponent's creatures must attack if able.

card.name: Rinpao, King of Speed Eating
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Dynamo

card.name: Honoo, the Brave Blow
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, this turn, each of your other creatures must attack if able.

card.name: Ragmal, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your creatures in the battle zone and put it into your mana zone. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures in the battle zone and puts it into its owner's mana zone.

card.name: Saiya, Spirit Knight
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ This creature can't attack players.

card.name: Jumbo Attacker, the Steel Ambassador
card.text: ■ Dynamo

card.name: Bursting Arm Robo Return Ace
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Dynamo ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Hekisario Dragoon
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your shields and put it into your hand. You can't use the "shield trigger" ability of that shield. ■ This creature can't attack.

card.name: Storium, Light Ray Doll
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, all your other creatures can't attack this turn.

card.name: Fuuma Erigoul
card.text: ■ While you have another Grand Devil in the battle zone, this creature gets +2000 power.

card.name: Shot Wheel of Meizrazen
card.text: ■ Each of your Tyranno Drakes in the battle zone gets "power attacker +3000". ''(While attacking, a creature that has "power attacker +3000" gets +3000 power.)''

card.name: Suza of Gale
card.text: ■ Each of your Tyranno Drakes in the battle zone gets "speed attacker". ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Gatling Cyclone
card.text: ■ Cyclone ■ Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 2000 or less.
